topic: Blood circulation in the human body

specification.description: Create a highly detailed anterior cutaway of the human heart showing four chambers: Right Atrium (superior-right), Right Ventricle (inferior-right), Left Atrium (superior-left), Left Ventricle (inferior-left). Depict the Tricuspid, Mitral, Pulmonary, and Aortic valves in their respective positions. Label all chambers and valves. Use a pale pink for myocardial tissue, blue for right-sided structures (deoxygenated blood), and red for left-sided structures (oxygenated blood). Show the septum separating right and left sides.
